Package election

Class InstantRunoffElection

java.lang.Object
election.Election
election.InstantRunoffElection
public class InstantRunoffElection
extends Election
InstantRunoffElection.java
Author:
Conor Brown, Jack Soderwall, Joe Cassidy, Sean Carter InstantRunoffElection process the Instant runoff election type and produces results. determineWinner() is the main function being run and will call various helper functions to parse the ballots file and store needed info, create media and audit files and to display results to the terminal.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class election.Election

    • InstantRunoffElection

      public InstantRunoffElection​(java.util.Scanner ballotFile)
      The constructor for an IR election. Will initialize all of the necessary parameters and then run the election. Essentially doubles as a driver for this class.

    • readBallotFile

      protected void readBallotFile​(java.util.Scanner ballotFile)
      Initialize election parameters from ballot file. See SRS for file format details.
      Specified by:
      readBallotFile in class Election
      Parameters:
      ballotFile - : Input file in Scanner form, pointed to second line of data.

    • writeAuditFileHeader

      protected void writeAuditFileHeader()
      Function will create the audit file and audit file writer and write the audit file head after the ballots file has been processed and initial information is stored. This function takes no parameters and has no return type.
      Specified by:
      writeAuditFileHeader in class Election

    • writeMediaFile

      protected void writeMediaFile()
      Create a file with an election summary to provide to the media. This function take no parameters and has no return type.
      Specified by:
      writeMediaFile in class Election

    • displayResultsToTerminal

      protected void displayResultsToTerminal()
      Displays relevant election results to the terminal. Output is formatted so as to fit the results of an Instant Runoff Election. This function takes no parameters and has no return type.
      Specified by:
      displayResultsToTerminal in class Election

    • determineWinner

      protected void determineWinner​(java.util.Scanner ballotFile)
      The main algorithm for an Instant Runoff election. Will determine the winner of the election and then display necessary information to the screen.
      Specified by:
      determineWinner in class Election
      Parameters:
      ballotFile - : The scanner for the election file that is passed into the program
